snippet.title: Texas family plagued with ailments gets $3M in 1st-of-its-kind fracking judgment
snippet.description:
* When the Parr family started having serious health problems late in 2008, they had no idea it was associated with what they call "a multitude" of drilling operations that popped up near their 40-acre ranch in Decatur, 60 miles northwest of Dallas.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/25/justice/texas-family-wins-fracking-lawsuit/index.html

snippet.title: Rescuers paint harrowing portrait of search aboard sunken ferry
snippet.description:
* In the final, chaotic moments before the South Korean ferry Sewol rolled over and sank into the chilly waters of the Yellow Sea, 48 girls obeyed the orders of crew members and put on their life vests.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/25/world/asia/south-korea-ship-sinking/index.html

snippet.title: Elizabeth Warren: The system's 'rigged' against middle class

snippet.title: Allergies: For love of pets, and their owners
snippet.description:
* Love is about give and take -- and sometimes a supply of nose sprays, inhalers, pills and tissues.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/15/health/pet-allergies-relationships/index.html

snippet.title: Diver on sunken South Korean ferry: 'We can't even face the families'
snippet.description:
* Divers spent a grim day bringing body after body out of the sunken ferry Sewol.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/21/world/asia/south-korea-ship-sinking/index.html

snippet.title: 15 of nature's most spectacular shows
snippet.description:
* Fireworks are fantastic and human endeavor has its place, but sometimes Mother Nature outshines any performance we can produce.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/22/travel/nature-must-see-shows/index.html

snippet.title: 5 stowaway attempts that didn't end tragically
snippet.description:
* News that a 16-year-old boy from California survived a five-hour flight in the wheel well of a Hawaii-bound Boeing 767 has shocked and impressed the world.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/22/travel/successful-stowaways/index.html

snippet.title: Political chatter: Three different takes on Ukraine, the role of the Pope and midterm politics
snippet.description:
* What will happen in Ukraine depends on who you ask. Officials from Russia, Ukraine and the United States appeared on the political talk shows to spin their narrative of events on the ground in the eastern European country embroiled in turmoil. If you...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/20/political-chatter-three-different-takes-on-ukraine-the-role-of-the-pope-and-midterm-politics/

snippet.title: Oceanic salvage manager: How we search for Flight 370
snippet.description:
* The wreckage of Malaysia Flight 370 has yet to be found, and the world has been riveted as search operations attempt to pinpoint the aircraft wreckage on the seafloor and begin to raise it.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/opinion/maclin-flight-370-search/index.html

snippet.title: 'Wake up, please!': Death toll from South Korean ferry rises to 50
snippet.description:
* Boat after boat, body after body from a capsized South Korean ferry came ashore Sunday morning, a solemn process interrupted by piercing cries and screams from passengers' kin.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/19/world/asia/south-korea-ship-sinking/index.html
